item.title: Bank of America likes this industrial turnaround story
item.description: Shares are up 54% in the past three months.

item.title: Tesla faces a series of technical and fundamental headwinds. This options trade maximizes returns
item.description: Options trader Tony Zhang breaks down a bearish options trade on Tesla.

item.title: Peter Thiel just bought a big stake in Tom Lee's ether company and the shares are surging
item.description: Bitmine Immersion Technologies recently launched an ether buying strategy and named Fundstrat's Tom Lee chairman.

item.title: Analysts are getting more bullish on these names with strong earnings growth
item.description: Semiconductor stocks such as Lam Research and Broadcom could outperform this earnings season, according to Wolfe Research.

item.title: This data center stock will be a winner as Nvidia resumes China shipments, JPMorgan says
item.description: Shares of this data center stock may see a boost as artificial intelligence darling Nvidia resumes shipments to China, according to JPMorgan.
